summary: UNCOUNTED exposes how the election fraud that altered the outcome of the 2004 election led to even greater fraud in 2006 and now looms as an unbridled threat to the outcome of the 2008 ... See full summary »
cast: John Conyers|Clint Curtis|Bob Fitrakis|Brad Friedman|Bruce Funk|Andrew Gumbel|Steve Heller|Robert Koehler|Marybeth Kuznik
title: Uncounted: The New Math of American Elections
